DataElement.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Administered Treatment Ind-3
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the yes/no indicator to ask if the patient received any medication to systemically treat symptoms of graft versus host disease.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Graft Versus Host Disease Administered Treatment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the administered treatment for chronic graft versus host disease.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A disease or condition that persists or progresses over a long period of time.:Graft-versus-host disease. A reaction of donated bone marrow or peripheral stem cells against a person's tissue.

Concepts.definition: Usually used to describe a condition that is persistent and long standing.
Graft-versus-host disease. A reaction of donated bone marrow or peripheral stem cells against a person's tissue.

Property.preferredDefinition: Given.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

Concepts.definition: The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, not observed, not recorded, or refused.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no/unknown.

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of yes, no, or unknown.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 4-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reeves

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 3/12/17 jk added Standard reg status; ownership transfered from CTEP to NCI Standards with concurrence of CTEP/Brian Campbell. 3/35/2016 jk removed "indeterminate" value that was added in error. 7/7/2021wz: added ALT VM name for HOPE-CARE project.

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving immunosuppressive or anti-rejection agents

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving anti-GVHD agents post bone marrow transplant

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving anti-GVHD or agents to prevent organ rejection post-transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Is patient receiving anti-GVHD agents post bone marrow transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 4
ReferenceDocuments.description: Is the patient receiving anti-GVHD agents: cyclosporine, tacrolimus or other agents to prevent graft-versus-host disease post bone marrow transplant?

ReferenceDocuments.description: Was there any therapy post SCT for the prevention of relapse during this reporting period?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 6
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did the patient receive relapse preventive treatment (post transplant) during this reporting period?
